com.rexsl.log
Class BulkHttpFeeder

java.lang.Object
  com.rexsl.log.AbstractHttpFeeder
      com.rexsl.log.BulkHttpFeeder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Feeder, Closeable, OptionHandler
public final class BulkHttpFeeder
extends AbstractHttpFeeder

Bulk feeder through HTTP POST request.

The feeder sends POST HTTP requests every X seconds (as configured with setPeriod(long)).

The class is thread-safe.

Since:
0.3.7
Version:
$Id: BulkHttpFeeder.java 1768 2012-05-29 05:52:26Z guard $
Author:
Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@rexsl.com)
